page.title: 20ARTS & CRAFTS _ PAXFORD AREA
page.content: There is a tradition of interest in arts & crafts in this area,which is continued both by established residents and those who have more recently settled here.Visitors to the area are particularly keen to sketch or paint its attractions. CREDITS_Members of Ebrington W.I.who contributed to this survey:_ J.Ball,J.Bevan,M.Burton,B.Candler, M.Coles,M.Currall,D.Drinkwater, M.Elphick,S.Elphick,P.Mitchell,M.Rose and V.Rose all of Ebrington. M.Fisher and B.Warren of Charingworth, P.Hickman of Darlingscott,G.Righton & S.Bell of Hidcote Bartrim & V.Forster & D.Harper of Chipping Campden and M.Wishart of Stretton-on-Fosse. B.& D.Candler entered the information onto the computer disc.
